Name: alignment-baseline
Values: auto | baseline | before-edge | text-before-edge | middle | central | after-edge | text-after-edge | ideographic | alphabetic | hanging | mathematical | inherit

Name: baseline-shift
Percentages: refer to the "line height" of the text element which in the case of SVG is defined to be equal to the font size

Name: clip
Applies to: elements which establish a new viewport pattern elements and marker elements

Name: clip-rule
Applies to: graphics elements within a clipPath element

Name: color
Applies to: elements to which properties fill stroke stop-color flood-color lighting-color apply

Name: color-interpolation
Applies to: container elements graphics elements and animateColor

Name: color-profile
Applies to: image elements that refer to raster images

Name: color-rendering
Applies to: container elements graphics elements and animateColor

Name: cursor
Values: [ [<funciri> ]* [ auto | crosshair | default | pointer | move | e-resize | ne-resize | nw-resize | n-resize | se-resize | sw-resize | s-resize | w-resize| text | wait | help ] ] | inherit

Name: display
Values: inline | block | list-item | run-in | compact | marker | table | inline-table | table-row-group | table-header-group | table-footer-group | table-row | table-column-group | table-column | table-cell | table-caption | none | inherit
Applies to: svg g switch a foreignObject graphics elements (including the text element) and text sub-elements (i.e. tspan tref altGlyph textPath)

Name: dominant-baseline
Values: auto | use-script | no-change | reset-size | ideographic | alphabetic | hanging | mathematical | central | middle | text-after-edge | text-before-edge | inherit

Name: font
Values: [ [ font-style || font-variant || font-weight ]? font-size [ / 'line-height' ]? font-family ] | caption | icon | menu | message-box | small-caption | status-bar | inherit

Name: font-size
yes the computed value is inherited
Percentages: refer to parent element's font size

Name: font-stretch
Values: normal | wider | narrower | ultra-condensed | extra-condensed | condensed | semi-condensed | semi-expanded | expanded | extra-expanded | ultra-expanded | inherit

Name: marker
Applies to: path line polyline and polygon elements

Name: marker-endmarker-midmarker-start
Applies to: path line polyline and polygon elements

Name: overflow
Applies to: elements which establish a new viewport pattern elements and marker elements

Name: pointer-events
Values: visiblePainted | visibleFill | visibleStroke | visible | painted | fill | stroke | all | none | inherit

Name: text-decoration
Values: none | [ underline || overline || line-through || blink ] | inherit

Name: visibility
Applies to: graphics elements (including the text element) and text sub-elements (i.e. tspan tref altGlyph textPath and a)

Name: writing-mode
Values: lr-tb | rl-tb | tb-rl | lr | rl | tb | inherit
